page.title: 16Home and Living in Adisham
page.content: Life at Adisham centres very strongly on the home. The women do their own housework, cooking and looking after children. Some of the married women combine these activities with a job. The modern houses have refrigerators, washing machines, and some deep freezes. Many older properties also have modern conveniences. All properties have main drainage and indoor bathrooms, with one exception, a rented cottage with only an outside toilet. Cooking is by gas or electric stoves or Aga solid fuel cookers, but gas services do not extend to the ham- lets. Many people do their own decora- ting and house renovations. Most homes have pets ranging from a cat and dog to various animals. These include tropical fish, ponies, horses, donkeys, goats, and birds such as budgerigars, cockatoos,canaries, ducks and fowls.
